events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster as a Software Engineer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
The initial screening call with our technical recruiter went well, covering your software development experience and technical skills in depth.
Thank you for promptly responding. You confirmed your availability for the upcoming technical interview next week.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 10th at 10 AM UTC. The session will include coding challenges and system design discussions.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, demonstrating strong programming skills and problem-solving abilities.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your expectations.
The HR interview went positively, with thorough discussions about the role and your career goals.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including details about compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your positive feedback on the offer. We are glad you're excited about the opportunity.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we look forward to having you join our engineering team.
Your onboarding process is underway, including access to development tools, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with your official start as a Software Engineer on May 27th.
